name: tic-tac-toe
description: A simple command-line Tic-Tac-Toe game implemented in Node.js. Enjoy the classic two-player game where players take turns marking spaces in a 3x3 grid, aiming to achieve three marks in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Have fun playing against a friend or challenge yourself against an AI opponent!
author: @MLAB1993
